document.full_text: ray allen hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 12 seconds left as the boston celtics rallied to beat the knicks in their playoff opener.
document.title: celtics 87, knicks 85: celtics beat knicks on allen's 3-pointer
lines_and_colors: ray allen hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 12 seconds left as the boston celtics rallied to beat the knicks in their playoff opener.
